title: How to Draw Simple Comic Characters

steps.title: Sketch a circle for the head.
steps.content: Sketch a circle for the head.

steps.title: Then, draw an oblong attached to the head.
steps.content: Then, draw an oblong attached to the head.

steps.title: Sketch a vertical oblong for the body.
steps.content: Sketch a vertical oblong for the body.

steps.title: Sketch the extremities and the neck as lines showing the cartoon character’s position.
steps.content: Sketch the extremities and the neck as lines showing the cartoon character’s position.

steps.title: Sketch 4 lines in the face as guidelines for the eyes, nose, and mouth.
steps.content: Sketch 4 lines in the face as guidelines for the eyes, nose, and mouth.

steps.title: Draw the eyes, mouth, and ears.
steps.content: Draw the eyes, mouth, and ears. Experiment on the expressions shown through these facial parts.

steps.title: Draw the hair as you like.
steps.content: Draw the hair as you like. You can also experiment on this.

steps.title: Then draw the body and the clothes that you like the character to have.
steps.content: Then draw the body and the clothes that you like the character to have.
